bibl.title: P. Monts. Roca inv. 65verso Again.
bibl.note: P. Mont. Roca Inv. 65 verso [edd.: Sofía TORALLAS TOVAR and Klaas A. WORP, A New Papyrus of the "Comparatio Menandri et Philistionis" (P. Monts. Roca inv. 65), Papiri filosofici. Miscellanea di Studi. V = Studi e testi per il Corpus dei papiri filosofici greci e latini. 14 (Firenze, 2007) pp. 177-184]. - Lines 12-21 correspond with Hippolytus' De Benedictionibus Isaaci et Iacobi p. 30.5-6 and p. 16.5 Brière-Mariès-Mercier. The author apparently drew passages from various Christian sources, among which Hippolytus, perhaps writing notes for a homily.
